about_the_game:
Vermilium: Blood Hunt

Caught in a mountain blizzard searching for a deadly beast, the hunters become the hunted.

Vermilium: Blood Hunt is a heart-pounding gothic horror adventure module set in the wintry frontier of the far north. Based on the original one-shot adventure released through the Savage Worlds Adventurer's Guild in 2020, Vermilium: Blood Hunt has been re-vamped!

The main adventure now takes your antiheroes between one and three sessions to complete, and comes with a number of optional side quests expanding on the lore of the Hunger Bay Trading Company, the frontier town of Rat Factory, and its odd inhabitants. These adventures are designed for Novice to Seasoned antiheroes, and require the Vermilium setting book and the Savage Worlds core book to play. Also included are new monsters, artifacts, ingredients, and rules for crafting all manner of strange taxidermy displays and companions!

Let the hunt begin.

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Calum McDermott

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Unity license and the Savage Worlds or Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds VTT

Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
